content:
★义务教育教科书★ 三年级起点六年级下册 
1 主编：刘文渊副主编：张京生三年级起点六年级下册 ★义务教育教科书★ Name (姓名)_________________ Class (班级)_________________ School (学校)_________________ 3 同学们，你们好！欢迎进入新奇、有趣的英语世界。接下来你们会结识很多小朋友，他们将会陪伴你们在一系列生动的情景和丰富的活动中学习英语，体验用英语交流的乐趣。 学习英语不仅仅需要模仿和背诵，更重要的是掌握正确的学习方法。要有信心，敢于开口；要勇于表达，乐于交流；要勤于练习，学以致用。 同学们，相信你们在使用这套教科书进行学习的同时，不仅能够领略异域的风情和文化，而且能够感受英语学习的快乐与喜悦。我们更希望你们熟练掌握英语阅读和表达的能力，学有所用，将来成为对社会、对国家有用的人才。 在这新奇、有趣的英语世界里，同学们尽情遨游吧！ 加油！你们是最棒的！ 编者 
4 Contents 7 Lesson 2 How can we do it? 13 Lesson 3 t’s cold in Harbin . 19 Lesson 4 Sally is going to Beijing . 31 Lesson 5 Can help you? 25 Revision 1 1 Lesson 1 He is wearing a blue T-shirt . 2

2 two Look! John is over there. He’s talking with his friends. Is he wearing a blue and white T-shirt? No. He is wearing a blue T-shirt. And he’s holding a basketball. Oh! He’s cool! John, this is my cousin, Jack. Nice to meet you, Jack. Nice to meet you, too. Jack likes playing basketball, too. Great! Let’s go and play. ◆ Listen again and act Look at that boy! Is it John? 4 Enjoy reading four You have a new home. You have a new home now. 1. What did Sally want? 2. What did Sally say to the toy bear? ◆ Read again and answer Sally’s mother bought the toy bear for her. Sally was very happy. She played with the toy bear at home. “You have a new home now, dear! Are you happy?” Sally said to the toy bear. Yesterday, Sally saw a toy bear in the toy shop. “Mum, I like that bear. It’s wearing a beautiful red coat. Can I have it for my birthday?” asked Sally. “But your birthday is in October,” said mum. “Please! I like it very much,” said Sally.

16 Enjoy reading 1. What is the weather like in London? 2. What do you think of the boy? sixteen ◆ Read again and answer In London, it’s not very hot in summer and not very cold in winter. But there’s a lot of rain in summer there. It is a sunny day. Mr Smith is walking in a park. He feels happy. Suddenly, it begins to rain. But he doesn’t bring an umbrella with him. He feels cold. “Hi! We can share this umbrella.” A boy is holding an umbrella behind him. Mr Smith feels warm now. He thanks the boy.

content: 22 Enjoy reading Where are you going? Harbin is in the north of China. It’s very cold in winter there. Do you want to see an ice palace? Go to Harbin’s Ice and Snow Festival. It’s wonderful! Xinjiang is in the west of China. The blue sky, green grass and white sheep make Xinjiang beautiful. People in Xinjiang like singing and dancing. It’s a very interesting place. There is no winter in Hainan. You can enjoy beautiful beaches all year round. You can also eat many kinds of fruits there. twenty-two Views Harbin Xinjiang Hainan an ice palace beautiful beaches blue sky, green grass and white sheep ◆ Read again and tick

content: 27 twenty-seven Tom was missing. His parents asked the police for help. “Please tell me something about him,” said the policeman. “He is short,” said Tom’s father. “He is wearing brown shorts, white shoes and a yellow shirt,” said Tom’s mother. Soon Tom’s photo was on TV. A man saw Tom. He called Tom’s father and the police. In the evening, the police found Tom and took him home. 1. Who did Tom’s father ask for help? 2. 34 One sunny morning, Mr White went shopping. He saw a beautiful carpet in the shop. He asked, “How much is it?” “It’s very old, Sir. A great man had it many years ago. It’s very expensive.” “How much is it?” Mr White asked again. A Beautiful Carpet 1. Who had the carpet many years ago? 2. What can the carpet do? 3. Did Mr White buy the carpet? Enjoy reading thirty-four ◆ Read again and answer “Five hundred and fifty pounds, my dear Sir. A beautiful, old carpet, Sir. It is also a magic carpet. It can fly.” “All right. I am going to take it. But I can’t pay now. You can fly with me to my house on the carpet. Then I can pay you.”

37 Lesson 6 Beijing is a great city. Sally and her father are in Beijing now. They’re looking at a map and talking about their travel plan. Where are they going today? Look and listen thirty-seven the Tian’anmen Square the Great Wall ◆ Listen again and tick the Summer Palace 
38 Look, listen and say thirty-eight ◆ Listen again and act Sally: Dad: Sally: Dad: Sally: Dad: Dad, where are we going today? We are going to the Summer Palace. It’s a beautiful park. What can we do there? We can see some old buildings, row a boat on the lake and walk around the park. Are we going to eat Beijing Roast Duck? Yes. We’re going to eat it for dinner today.

There is a big stone boat on the lake. We rowed a boat on the lake. We ate Beijing Roast Duck for dinner today. It was very good. We also ate jiaozi. I can’t use chopsticks. I ate with my hands. Beijing is a great city. We had a good time today. Love, Sally 1. What did Sally do in the Summer Palace? 2. What did Sally have for dinner? Enjoy reading forty ◆ Read again and answer m Email ▲ ▲

46 Enjoy reading forty-six ◆ Read again and retell Yesterday was a sunny day. Tom and his parents went to the park by bike. In the park, Tom flew a kite and played games. His parents talked and laughed. After lunch, they put the waste in a big bag. Tom saw a baby bird in the grass. “Come here, Dad!” said Tom. Dad ran to him. “Look! The baby bird can’t fly. Where’s its mum?” said Tom. “Over there! In the tree!” said dad. Then they put the bird back home. The mother bird was very happy. And Tom was happy, too. A Baby Bird

content:
52 1. When did John begin to study English? 2. Do the pupils like Miss Wang? Why? Enjoy reading fifty-two ◆ Read again and answer Dear Miss Wang, Four years ago, you became my f irst English teacher. You were young and beautiful. You often had a big smile on your face. Your class was very interesting. We all felt very happy. My English was not good at first, but you helped me a lot. Now I like English very much. Thank you for your help. It’s time to say goodbye to our school. I’m going to miss you. Best wishes to you! Love, John 
53 What are you going to say to your teacher? You helped me a lot. I like English and I love you. You’re always kind to us. Thanks! I am going to study hard. You are a great teacher. fifty-three Say goodbye to your teacher or your friends

The dog in the water was gone, too. He was very sad. He walked home very slowly. He was still hungry. ◆ Read again and answer How many dogs are there in the story? metadata.filename: 义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）六年级下册_b45ec25b
metadata.source: /Users/LeoQin/Documents/GitHub/PDFconvertor/flattened_pdfs/义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）六年级下册_b45ec25b.pdf

content: 66 《义务教育教科书英语》是根据教育部制定的《义务教育英语课程标准》由我国英语教学专家、特级英语教师合作编写的一套全新的小学英语教材，共八册，每学期一册。《义务教育教科书英 语》（六年级下册），供以小学三年级为起点开设英语的学校第四学年第二学期使用。 本套教材特别注重英语学科工具性和人文性的统一，强调“用英语做事情”的理念，贴近学生生活，培养学生综合运用英语的能力，有助于学生在学习过程中发展语言能力、思维能力和交流合作能力。 本套教材采用单课（Lesson）的编排方式，以话题为线索，以情景和对话为主要呈现形式，以学生兴趣为切入点，以活动为主要方式，注重语言结构和交际功能相结合，培养学生积极主动的学习习惯，在学习过程中领会和认识不同文化，促进学生的全面发展。 本册呈现16个基本词、22个拓展词，综合复现了整套教材的重点语法项目，以与学生生活实际密切相关的话题对整个小学阶段的语言学习进行了梳理，用生动的活动对学生的语言运用能力进行了综合评价。每课专设“Check and t ick”栏目作为本课语言学习的重点提示。 《义务教育教科书英语》由主编刘文渊和副主编张京生主持修订工作。参与本册教科书修订工作的主要人员有尹若飞、王玉青，姚红艳、张静、崔艳艳、吴莹也为本册教科书的修订做了一定的工作。同时修订工作还得到了国内有关专家的大力支持。 诚请专家、教师、家长、学生对本套教材提出宝贵意见，以便修改提高。 后记 产品
